snippet.title: Minimal Affect Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Minimal Affect is a story-driven space adventure with a colorful cast of characters on a quest to save the galaxy once again and get into a LOT of space alien combat. Guide your team, meet new characters, learn new  skills,  explore  side  quests  and  generally  do  everything  you’d  expect  to  do  in  a  third-person  action  RPG, all set in a vibrant, stylish world that feels like playing a cartoon.

Developed by Toadman Studios and published by Sold Out– both companies in the EG7 group, Minimal Affect will launch in North America and Europe. The title will be available on most major consoles and  Windows  PC  at  launch,  with  more  platform  details  to  be  revealed  at  a  later  date.  

For more info please visit www.minimalaffect.com
